title: Horseshoe Bend National Military Park: While At The Park - Self Guided
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip     Self Guided     While At The Park - Self Guided                  While At The park      The most common self guided activities at the park include;20 minute film 'Battle of Horseshoe Bend'museum visitwalking the nature trail (2.7 miles) or battle tour road (3 miles)
